Html:
radioman,

can the map versions be set as properties.

i can then give my clients new values to enter into my system for the Map Versions, rather than have to rebuild and release a new version of the Gmap.Net dll's.

 

so this can be configurated with variables.

VersionGoogleMap = "m@111";
VersionGoogleSatellite = "47";
VersionGoogleLabels = "h@111";
VersionGoogleTerrain = "w2p.111";
VersionGoogleMapChina = "w2.111";
VersionGoogleSatelliteChina = "47";
VersionGoogleLabelsChina = "w2t.111";
VersionGoogleTerrainChina = "w2p.111";

 

Thanks,

Paul.
Perhaps it would be even simpler if this could be read from a configuration (text/xml) file? That way no re-compilation would need to happen for map updates.

perhaps these values are automatically adjusted if needed ;}, but you can set yourself it if you are really sure ;} 

GMaps.Instance.VersionGoogleMap/etc
